channel.title: How do i make hidden admin on my server?
channel.description:
I was wondering if someone could please tell me how to make people hidden admin or hidden mod on my server. All help appreciated , except spam and [url=http://Youfail.org]Youfail.org[/url] .... :)
Thanks XxGANGSTAxX
~If you talk shit, you may as well eat it aswell~

item.title: How do i make hidden admin on my server?
item.dc:creator: @akl akl
item.description:
@akl wrote:

Some servers don’t have these. Hidden mod/admin/owner. W/E.
You ordering us not to flame or anything doesn’t stop 98.76% of the Moparscapers.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make hidden admin on my server?

item.title: How do i make hidden admin on my server?
item.dc:creator: @bomb65 bomb65
item.description:
@bomb65 wrote:

1=mod 2=admin 3=owner/co-owner 4=hidden admin 5=hidden owner. There isnt a hidden mod.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make hidden admin on my server?

item.title: How do i make hidden admin on my server?
item.dc:creator: @khisrow khisrow
item.description:
@khisrow wrote:

HMm 1 = is mod… 2 = is admin, 3 = is owner, so i thin 4 is hiden admin …

So 4 = hidden admin o.O
